titleStmt.title: The Inconsistency of man's Dagon with God's ark, or, [A] Sober discourse, shewing the great sinfulness of humane mixtures in divine worship

notesStmt.note: "The Great and necessary duty of mutual exhortation opened and applied from Hebrews III, xiii" p. 35-63, has special half-title page.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams' Library.
